title: Ping going to NA from Japan has gotten unplayable
body: Since right before the worlds roll out, my ping to NA from Japan (where I live) has become unplayable. It used to be 180 when good and 220 when bad. Even at 220 it was playable, but now it's 100ms higher and the game has become unplayable. My ping to the JP server is unchanged and I've got good speeds to everything else but NA lol. All of my friends are on NA so I'd really like to be able to play there. What can I do to fix my ping?

replies.body: You're playing from a pretty far physical distance, so you're generally going to have higher ping.  The recent spike might have been caused by a change of routing, though.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, with especial focus on configuring your DNS to try and change your routing.  Test it in a custom and let me know if that helps.
reconfiguring my DNS has seemed to help. It went back down to the 180ping. thank you very much
